name: Gob Stopper - Magical Machine Learning
description:
*Flashing lights warning!*

Wizards are curious about machine learning too!

The Mage's Guild has developed a new AI Librarian to generate powerful spell books. Like a genetic algorithm, it creates some spells, sees which are the most powerful, and generates more like them. Only, how is it going to get the data to determine which spells are the best?

That's where you come in - you are tasked with testing the lethality of the Librarian's spells against a never-ending horde of goblins. Each spell has a randomly generated set of attributes (power, speed, cooldown, aim, trajectory, etc) based on the attributes of the most powerful spell you have equipped. Old weak spells will be thrown away and replaced with new powerful spells.

Collaborate with this AI to see which spell is the best - or blind yourself trying.

Assets used:

midjourney AI for title screen and robot art.

Goblin01 - DancingEyebrows https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/goblin01-188119
